title: North Cambridge Near Alewife T Stop/Davis Square
posting_body: I have an open bedroom in a 2 bed/1 bath apartment in North Cambridge for $1,200 plus utilities.
It is a classic triple decker with front/back porch, shared backyard with a fire pit and grilling area, large living room, large dining room, and a large kitchen.
Free laundry and storage in basement.
Close (5 minute walk) to the Alewife stop on the red line and several bus connections, and walkable to Davis, Porter, or Harvard squares.
I am entering my fifth year at MIT and have lived in this unit the entire time, it has been perfect!
I work in-person 100% of the time during the academic year.
When I am not working enjoy being outdoors/being active, grabbing drinks with friends, or just having a quiet night in.
